data.author: Blackfox

descriptions.app_description: A bot that Monitors the number of daily active users on a platform.

key_features: Parse and process DAU metrics from received messages.
Format messages based on predefined templates or logic.
Send formatted DAU updates back to the channel.
Log message formatting and DAU tracking activity for auditing purposes.

events: Format messages based on predefined templates or logic.
Send formatted DAU updates back to the channel.
Log DAU tracking activity for auditing purposes.
